price: Houvesse, em ambos outros deuses que Allah, haveriam sido ambos corrompidos. Então, glorificado seja Allah, O Senhor do Trono, acima do que alegam!
arabic: لَوۡ كَانَ فِيهِمَآ ءَالِهَةٌ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ لَفَسَدَتَاۚ فَسُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: law kāna fīhimā ālihatun illā al-lahu lafasadatā fasub'ḥāna al-lahi rabbi al-ʿarshi ʿammā yaṣifūna
